mapper.select:
SELECT CID as CID ,SERVER_IP as SERVER_IP ,BTIME as BTIME ,ETIME as ETIME ,RBTIME as RBTIME ,TELECOM as TELECOM ,CALLDURATION as CALLDURATION ,CALLER as CALLER ,CALLED as CALLED ,CPID as CPID ,CPNAME as CPNAME ,CPFILENAME as CPFILENAME ,CPRECUSE as CPRECUSE ,LINKEDID as LINKEDID ,DIRNAME as DIRNAME ,FILENAME as FILENAME ,FILESIZE as FILESIZE ,RECORDCHARGEID as RECORDCHARGEID ,INFO1 as INFO1 ,INFO2 as INFO2 ,INFO3 as INFO3 ,INFO4 as INFO4 ,CREATETIME as CREATETIME ,UPDATETIME as UPDATETIME FROM CALL_HISTORY T1 WHERE 1=1
LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

SELECT CID as CID ,SERVER_IP as SERVER_IP ,BTIME as BTIME ,ETIME as ETIME ,RBTIME as RBTIME ,TELECOM as TELECOM ,CALLDURATION as CALLDURATION ,CALLER as CALLER ,CALLED as CALLED ,CPID as CPID ,CPNAME as CPNAME ,CPFILENAME as CPFILENAME ,CPRECUSE as CPRECUSE ,LINKEDID as LINKEDID ,DIRNAME as DIRNAME ,FILENAME as FILENAME ,FILESIZE as FILESIZE ,RECORDCHARGEID as RECORDCHARGEID ,INFO1 as INFO1 ,INFO2 as INFO2 ,INFO3 as INFO3 ,INFO4 as INFO4 ,CREATETIME as CREATETIME ,UPDATETIME as UPDATETIME FROM CALL_HISTORY T1 WHERE 1=1
